attributes.action: NOT give a peerage to Cardinal Cormac Murphy O'Connor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: The call to forego the award of a peerage to Cardinal Cormac Murphy O'Connor is acceptable, but your extra detail contains allegations of potentially serious criminal wrongdoing which have not been proven in a court of law and therefore cannot be repeated on this website.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
